DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study compare effectiveness safety LY2963016 versus Lantus control blood sugar level combination two oral diabetes medication .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Adults With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Have Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus base disease diagnostic criterion World Health Organization ( WHO ) classification Have take least 2 type oral diabetes medication least 12 week prior enter study Have Hemoglobin A1c value great equal 7.0 percent less equal 11.0 percent insulin naive If previously Lantus , Hemoglobin A1c must less equal 11.0 percent Have body mass index less equal 45 kilogram per meter square ( kg/m^2 ) Have significant liver , cardiac gastrointestinal disease Have active cancer cancer within past 5 year ( exception basal cell carcinoma carcinoma situ ) Have excessive resistance insulin hypersensitivity Lantus Have one episode severe low blood sugar ( define need someone else help low blood sugar ) within 6 month enter study Have take insulin Lantus within past 30 day Taking diabetes medicine allow study approve take insulin
